author: Andrew J. Hawkins
title: Now is a great time to buy an e-bike
description: An electric bike could be the most useful vehicle for riding out the pandemic. An e-bike also lets you ride farther to escape the congested hearts of most cities where crowded bike paths can still pose a risk. Traffic is down in many cities, and e-bikes can h…
content:
If youve been thinking about buying an electric bike but have been hesitant to pull the trigger, now may be the best time to go through with a purchase. 
COVID-19 has completely upended how we get around on a daily basis. Public transportation is seen as too… [+7101 chars]
